page.title: 19THE SPIRIT UNDER THE STAIRS
page.content: Have you ever noticed that when you walk up your stairs a moaning and squeaking comes from them? Do you stop to think what it might be? One day I decided to go through the doorway under the stairs to see what made the noise.Through the door I went and ran out again with fright.After a while overcome with curiosity I went in again and there it hung floating in the air moaning dreadfully! Are you a ghost I stammered? I am a spirit who has roamed for 300 years. The name of this house is Cilgelynen<the house of the holly>.I was a priest.This was a safe house.I went into the priest hole to sleep and there I died.I became a spirit and haunted the house.The house was built by a Scotsman who built a priest hole to allow enemies of the Roundheads to hide.It was used by people like me to hide.
